title: "85% of organizations are using AI in deployed applications"
excerpt: "For mature adopters, the need to control for interpretability and transparency of machine learning models was the second-most cited risk factor (~55%), while those still evaluating AI placed fairness, bias, and ethics (~40%) in second place. While the risks of AI can be intimidating, the benefits can be worth the risk. For all adopters ..."
